channel.title: CVE Feed for RICOH COMPANY, LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RICOH COMPANY, LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-6021|2024-08-04T20:16:24.377Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- library%20information%20management%20system%20limedio
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in Library Information Management System LIMEDIO all versions allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2024-39927|2024-08-02T04:33:11.023Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- im%20c3510%2Fc3010
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in Ricoh MFPs and printers. If a remote attacker sends a specially crafted request to the affected products, the products may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition and/or user's data may be destroyed.

item.title: CVE-2024-22475|2024-08-01T22:51:09.846Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- multiple%20printers%20and%20scanners
item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability in multiple printers and scanners which implement Web Based Management provided by BROTHER INDUSTRIES, LTD. allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to perform unintended operations on the affected product. As for the details of affected product names, model numbers, and versions, refer to the information provided by the respective vendors listed under [References].

item.title: CVE-2024-21824|2024-08-01T22:27:36.289Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- multiple%20printers%20and%20scanners
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in exists in multiple printers and scanners which implement Web Based Management provided by BROTHER INDUSTRIES, LTD. If this vulnerability is exploited, a network-adjacent user who can access the product may impersonate an administrative user. As for the details of affected product names, model numbers, and versions, refer to the information provided by the respective vendors listed under [References].

item.title: CVE-2024-39927|2024-07-15T13:14:08.398Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- im%20c3510%2Fc3010
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in Ricoh MFPs and printers. If a remote attacker sends a specially crafted request to the affected products, the products may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition and/or user's data may be destroyed.

item.title: CVE-2024-37387|2024-06-21T14:57:55.163Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- ricoh%20streamline%20nx%20pc%20client
item.description: Use of potentially dangerous function issue exists in Ricoh Streamline NX PC Client. If this vulnerability is exploited, files in the PC where the product is installed may be altered.

item.title: CVE-2024-37124|2024-06-20T15:44:52.938Z -- ricoh%20company%2C%20ltd. -- ricoh%20streamline%20nx%20pc%20client
item.description: Use of potentially dangerous function issue exists in Ricoh Streamline NX PC Client. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may create an arbitrary file in the PC where the product is installed.
